sentences.en: A disco isn't exactly a den of iniquity.
sentences.cn: 迪斯科舞厅并非藏污纳垢之处。

sentences.en: Forgive my sin, O LORD, and purify me from my iniquity.
sentences.cn: 啊,主啊, 饶恕我的罪, 从我的过犯中洁净我.

sentences.en: He had plumbed the very depths of iniquity.
sentences.cn: 他已经深测了罪恶的深渊.

sentences.en: He regards the city as a place where all forms of iniquity are practised.
sentences.cn: 他认为该城是万恶丛集的渊薮.

sentences.en: He thought of New York as a den of iniquity.
sentences.cn: 他认为纽约是个藏污纳垢之处.

sentences.en: It was a sink of iniquity.
That thou inquirest after mine iniquity, and searchest after my sin?
sentences.cn: 伯10:6就追问我的罪孽 、 察我的罪过 麽 .

sentences.en: The iniquity of Ephraim is bound up ; His sin is stored up.
sentences.cn: 何13:12 以法 莲的罪孽包裹、他的罪恶收藏.

sentences.en: The iniquity of the transaction aroused general indignation.
sentences.cn: 这笔交易的不公引起了普遍的愤怒.

sentences.en: They retired to repose , accordingly, and all was silent in this asylum of iniquity.
sentences.cn: 于是他们都休息了, 在这个罪恶的渊薮中一切归于岑寂.

sentences.en: They were trying to protect their son from iniquity.
sentences.cn: 他们竭力保护儿子免受不公正待遇。

sentences.en: Though I cannot save her from shame, I may prevent the continuance of iniquity.
sentences.cn: 虽然我不能使她免于羞辱, 可是我可以不让她的罪过再延续下去.

sentences.en: Wash me thoroughly from my iniquity And cleanse me from my sin.
sentences.cn: 诗51:2求你将我的罪孽洗除净尽、并洁除我的罪.

sentences.en: Wash me throughly from mine iniquity, and cleanse me from my sin.
sentences.cn: 2求你将我的罪孽洗除净尽并洁除我的罪.

trans.tran_en: the quality of being very unfair or evil, or something that is very unfair
